allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: UI/UX design overhaul - modern components and interactions

- Admin dark mode: GitHub-style theme with semantic color tokens
- NewsCard: All 5 variants updated with modern shadows and animations
- HeroCarousel: Crossfade transitions, progress bar, play/pause control
- Sidebar: Gradient headers, improved visual hierarchy
- Header mega menu: Slide-down animation, modern dropdown design
- Mobile menu: Slide-in panel with backdrop blur
- Toast: Accent bar, rounded design, improved icon styling
- ConfirmModal: Centered layout, gradient buttons, modern appearance

Generated with Claude Code
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Admin Bot Dashboard UI/UX Overhaul

Phase 1 - Real-time Monitoring:
- Add RegionHeatmap component showing 27 regions with health status
- Add CollectionChart with daily stats and trend visualization
- Add AlertBanner for error/warning notifications
- Connect dashboard to real APIs (/api/bot/health, /api/bot/stats)
- Implement 30s auto-refresh with toggle control

Phase 2 - UX Improvements:
- Improve log viewer with date range filters and pagination
- Add keyboard shortcuts to article management (J/K navigate, Enter open, A approve, D delete, Space select, Esc close)

Phase 3 - Scheduler Enhancement:
- Visual hour selector (24-hour grid)
- Quick preset buttons for common schedules
- Next run times preview
- Recent run history display
- Human-readable cron expression display

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add dynamic Hero Slider with admin-configurable regions

- Add HeroSlider component with auto-rotation (4s default), hover pause, mobile swipe
- Add admin settings page for hero slider configuration at /admin/settings/hero-slider
- Add /api/hero-slider endpoint for fetching region-based articles
- Add /api/site-settings endpoint for managing site configuration
- Add site_settings.sql for DB schema (needs manual execution on Supabase)
- Support duplicate regions (e.g., showing 1st and 2nd gwangju articles)

EOF
)")

Bash(powershell -Command "Set-Location ''d:\\cbt\\koreanews\\scripts''; python -c ""
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os
from supabase import create_client

load_dotenv\(\)
supabase = create_client\(os.getenv\(''NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL''\), os.getenv\(''SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY''\)\)

result = supabase.table\(''posts''\).select\(''id, title, ai_processed, ai_processed_at, ai_validation_grade, ai_validation_warnings''\).eq\(''ai_processed'', True\).limit\(1\).execute\(\)

if result.data:
    article = result.data[0]
    print\(''=== AI Ï≤òÎ¶¨Îêú Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ ÌôïÏù∏ ===''\)
    print\(f''ID: {article[""id""]}''\)
    print\(f''Title: {article[""title""][:50]}...''\)
    print\(f''AI Processed: {article[""ai_processed""]}''\)
    print\(f''Processed At: {article[""ai_processed_at""]}''\)
    print\(f''Grade: {article[""ai_validation_grade""]}''\)
    print\(f''Warnings: {article[""ai_validation_warnings""]}''\)
""")
